Package MWC.GUI

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BaseLayer.ProvidesRange
    marker interface for layers that implement their own getRange(), and where our processing should not inspect the children
    CanEnumerate
    interface for a Debrief entity that contains other child elements
    CanPlotFaded  
    CanvasType
    interface for canvases to implement for plotting commands The CanvasType interface provides all of the drawing operations which may be made onto a scale plot.
    CanvasType.MultiLineTooltipProvider
    marker interface for classes which can provide a multi-line text label
    CanvasType.PaintListener
    // support for adding a list of painters to this class
    CanvasType.ScreenUpdateListener
    interface for classes that want to know when screen refreshes happen
    CanvasType.ScreenUpdateProvider
    interface for classes that are able to provide screen update information
    CanvasType.TooltipHandler
    class to allow provision of a custom tooltip dependent on the mouse position provided
    CoreTabPanel  
    CreateEditorForParent
    behavior for a class that wishes editors to also be created for its parent
    Defaults.PreferenceProvider  
    DynamicPlottable
    interface for time-sensitive objects that need to know the time in order to plot
    Editable
    Interface defining behaviour for a screen item which should be editable by the user (using Bean properties)

    The file also contains an abstract which implements the required behaviour
    Editable.DoNoInspectChildren  
    Editable.DoNotHighlightMe
    marker interface used by classes that don't want to be highlighted by a snail painter, or the plot selection indicator
    Editable.DynamicDescriptors
    marker interface for objects with changeable descriptors - so we re-calculate them everytime
    ErrorLogger
    interface for classes that are able to fire/throw error messages
    ExcludeFromRightClickEdit
    marker interface for classes that should not be included in a right-click contextual edit on the plot - such as narrative entries
    Exportable  
    ExportLayerAsSingleItem
    flag to indicate that a whole layer should actually be exported as a single item
    ExtendedCanvasType  
    ExtendedEditable  
    GeoToolsHandler  
    Griddable.HasNonBeanPropertyDescriptors  
    Griddable.NonBeanPropertyDescriptor  
    GriddableSeriesMarker  
    HasEditables
    interface for a Debrief entity that contains other child elements
    HasEditables.ProvidesContiguousElements
    interface for class that normally provides it's elements in a tiered fashion, but is able to provide them as a single list (for when an external class wants to process all of them as one list - double-click nearest testing).
    hasPropertyListeners  
    Layer
    this class is a collection of objects which may be plotted to a Chart
    Layer.BackgroundLayer
    marker interface to indicate that this layer wants to be the very first layer
    Layer.NoPaintInOverview
    marker interface for layers that should not be painted in the overview chart
    Layers.DataListener
    interface to be implemented by classes intending to watch the full set of data for this scenarion
    Layers.DataListener2
    extended interface which indicates the new item
    Layers.INewItemListener
    interface for classes that want to know about new items being added
    Layers.NeedsToKnowAboutLayers
    marker for objects that want to know about the parent layer (prob because they can create other layers)
    Layers.NeedsWrappingInLayerManager
    marker for objects that must be wrapped before they are pasted into the layer manager
    Layers.OperateFunction  
    MessageProvider
    interface for object that can show a message to the user
    Moveable  
    NeedsToBeInformedOfRemove
    interface for objects that need to be informed when they are being removed from the Layers object
    NotInBaseLayer
    marker interface for objects that may not be placed in a base layer - but which must sit in their own specialised layer
    Pane
    interface for components which fit into a view
    PlainChart.ChartClickListener
    definition of function to be implemented for each mouse movement
    PlainChart.ChartCursorMovedListener
    definition of function to be implemented for each mouse movement
    PlainChart.ChartDoubleClickListener  
    PlainChart.ChartDragListener
    definition of function to be implemented if an area is selected on the chart
    PlainWrapper.InterpolatedData  
    Plottable
    an object which may be plotted to a canvas
    Plottables.PlotMeFirst
    marker interface to indicate that this plottable should get plotted before the others.
    PlottablesType  
    Renamable
    interface for objects that can be renamed
    ShapeCanvasType  
    StatusBar  
    StepperListener  
    StepperListener.StepperController
    embedded interface for an actual stepper controller (such as the Debrief Step Control)
    SupportsPropertyListeners  
    TimeStampedDataItem  
    Tool
    definition of things to be implemented by a command
    Toolbar
    interface to be implemented by classes which produce a toolbar for our use
    ToolParent
    interface of methods to be provided by a parent of a tool, mostly providing functionality necessary setting a busy cursor
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseLayer
    this class is a collection of objects which may be plotted to a Chart
    BaseLayer.BaseLayerTest  
    CanvasType.PaintAdaptor
    duff implementation of PaintListener, so classes can choose to extend just part of the listener interface
    DataListenerAdaptor
    this class provides a no-op default instantiation of a data listener, it is to be extended by any concrete class expecting to handle data listener messages
    Defaults  
    DynamicLayer
    specialised type of layer that is able to plot dynamic children, that-is elements that are time-sensitive.
    Editable.CategorisedPropertyDescriptor
    ******************************************************************* class adding category information to a property (used in SWT) *******************************************************************
    Editable.DeprecatedPropertyDescriptor
    convenience class for marking a property as deprecated (one that we won't load in NG)
    Editable.editableTesterSupport
    internal class providing test support - tests that tests called provide all required setter/getter methods
    Editable.EditorType
    definition of data required for editing
    Editable.HelpContext
    ******************************************************************* class containing the help description for a particular *******************************************************************
    ExternallyManagedDataLayer
    class that represents an external datafile
    Griddable  
    Layers
    Plain implementation of layer manager.
    Layers.LayersTest  
    LoggingService
    logging service that accomodates a surrogate - so the fancy RCP gui can register as a logger with the legacy ASSET code
    MessageProvider.Base
    core implementation, used by anybody...
    MessageProvider.TestableMessageProvider
    instance we can use to test message provider is working correctly
    PlainChart
    GUI-independent implemententation of a chart
    PlainWrapper
    This class shows all the responsibilities of the wrapper items.
    Plottables
    a list of Plottables
    Plottables.CompareEditables
    embedded class that knows how to compare two editables
    Plottables.Grid4WTest  
    Plottables.IteratorWrapper  
    PlottableSelection
    definition of class to handle copying via clipboard
    Rubberband  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    FireExtended
    declare an annotation as a marker, used for methods that have changed the fundamental data in debrief, and need a 'fireExtended' event versus a 'fireModified' event.
    FireReformatted
    declare an annotation as a marker, used for methods that have changed the fundamental data in debrief, and need a 'fireReformatted' event versus a 'fireModified' event.
